mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gallery(galleryno, memberno, g_title, g_content, g_cnt, thumbs, files, sizes, g_word, rdate) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(galleryno), 0) + 1 as galleryno FROM gallery), #{memberno}, #{g_title}, #{g_content}, #{g_cnt}, #{thumbs}, #{files}, #{sizes}, #{g_word}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT galleryno, memberno, g_title, g_content, g_cnt, thumbs, files, sizes, g_word, rdate FROM gallery ORDER BY rdate DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM gallery
SELECT galleryno, memberno, g_title, g_content, g_cnt, thumbs, files, sizes, g_word, rdate FROM gallery WHERE galleryno=#{galleryno}
